Reference

Import and pre-processing

Functions to read-in NMR spectra and prepare for statistical analysis

readBruker()

Importing 1D NMR spectra from Bruker

bline()

Baseline correction for NMR spectra

calibration()

Spectral calibration to a chemical shift reference

spec.quality()

Calculating spectral quality indices

get.idx()

Find indices in ppm vector for respective chemical shift range

noise.est()

Estimation of noise level

lw()

Calculating full width at half max

minmax()

Min-max scaling

totalArea()

Total area normalisation

pqn()

Probabilistic quotient normalisation

Visualisation of spectral data

spec()

Simple plotting of a single NMR spectrum

matspec()

Simple plotting of multiple NMR spectra overlayed

specOverlay()

Higher level plotting function to overlay NMR spectra (ggplot2 based)

Statistical modelling and model visualisations

pca()

Perform Principal Component Analysis

opls()

Fitting Orthogonal-Partial Least Squares Models

pred.opls()

OPLS model predictions

dmodx()

Calculating distance to the model in X space

plotscores()

Plotting PCA, PLS or OPLS model scores

plotload()

Plotting PCA or OPLS loadings

specload()

Overlay PCA or OPLS loadings with spectra
